title: Furnished sublease 1 bedroom/1 bath apartment
posting_body: I am renting out my whole furnished 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment from 8/30 and on.
Looking for someone to take over for at least 2 weeks or longer.
It will be $110/day utilities included + $350 refundable security deposit for 2 weeks.
There is a possibility for you to extend the sublease for another few weeks or months if you are looking for something more long-term, just let me know.
I am pretty flexible with dates and we can prorate it accordingly.
If you are wanting to rent it out for a whole month, the whole month's rent will be $2800 excluding utilities.
And if you are renting out for a month, there will be a refundable $600 security deposit, as I am leaving my belongings and valuables behind.
As long as nothing gets taken, or broken, the full security deposit will be returned to you after you move out.
Comes with this outdoor balcony, 2 parking spots in secured garage, smartTV, dishwasher, laundry in building, a spacious walk-in closet, fireplace and AC.
The place will come with kitchen appliances, utensils, towels, bedding, pillows, etc. as well so you don't have to buy them for your visit.

If you are interested, please send me an email with a little description of who you are, your desired dates, and links to your social media platforms so I can get an idea of who is renting out my place!
Looking for someone to move in 8/30 and preferring to rent it out to someone who can stay the longest!
